Package kaitech.database

Class PinTblImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • kaitech.api.database.AbstractTable
      • kaitech.database.PinTblImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PinTable
    public class PinTblImpl
extends AbstractTable
implements PinTable
    PinTblImpl extends AbstractTable, implements the PinTable interface, and permits limited access to the data stored in the Pins table.

      • getHashedPin

        public java.lang.String getHashedPin​(java.lang.String name)
        Description copied from interface: PinTable
        Retrieves a pin from the cache. If the pin does not currently exist in the cache, query the database for the pin. If the query is successful, add the pin to the cache and return it.
        Specified by:
        getHashedPin in interface PinTable
        Parameters:
        name - The name associated with the pin to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The char array pin if it exists, null if it does not or cannot be retrieved.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        name - The String name for the pin.
        hashedPin - The hashed and salted new String pin to be added.
        salt - The salt for the pin.
